Welcome to hamrobazaar’s documentation!¶

class hamrobazaar.aioclient.HamrobazaarClient(api_key: str, session: Optional[ClientSession] = None)¶
async close() → None¶

Close opened session

async filter_category(name: str) → Category¶

Filter category with name

Args:

name (str): Name of the category

Raises:

CategoryNotFound: If category with that name was not found

Returns:

Category

async get_categories() → list[hamrobazaar.types.Category]¶

Return all categories present in hamrobazaar

Returns:

list[Category]

async get_product_detail(product_id: str) → ProductDetail¶

Return product detail for a specific product id

Args:

product_id (str): Product id to get details for

Raises:

ProductNotFound: When no product with given id is found

Returns:

ProductDetail

async get_products(category: Category, page_number: int = 1, page_size: int = 10) → list[hamrobazaar.types.Category]¶

Return products based on given category

Args:

category (Category): Category to return products from page_number (int, optional): Page number to return products from. Defaults to 1. page_size (int, optional): Number of products to display. Defaults to 10.

Raises:

ReachedLastPage: If reached last page.

Returns:

list[Category]

async main_page_products(page_number: int = 1, page_size: int = 10) → list[hamrobazaar.types.Product]¶

Return products displayed on main page

Args:

page_number (int, optional): Page number to show products of. Defaults to 1. page_size (int, optional): Number of products to display. Defaults to 10.

Returns:

list[Product]

exception hamrobazaar.exceptions.CategoryNotFound(*args: object)¶

Raised when category with given filter is not found

exception hamrobazaar.exceptions.HamrobazaarException¶

Base exception class for hamrobazaar api

exception hamrobazaar.exceptions.ProductNotFound(*args: object)¶

Raised when product with given filter is not found.

exception hamrobazaar.exceptions.ReachedLastPage(*args: object)¶

Raised when given page numbers exceeds last page
